about_the_game:
"Truth Of Falchion" - The game in real time, the protagonist, traveling on land and water, exploring the world in search of treasure, improves his skills and skills - these are the harsh everyday life of the royal treasure hunter, whose role is assigned to you . You will come across many interesting puzzles and secrets.

  • Impeccable artistic style, executed according to the canons of classical fantasy.
  • Beautiful, thoughtful and convenient interface.
  • A fascinating plot.
  • Freedom to move the hero around the world, consisting of dozens of diverse locations.
  • Amazing adventures that will not leave anyone indifferent.
  • A fascinating musical atmosphere in the scenes created under the guidance of famous musicians.
